Question 1
  Found [pigeonhole_sort] with compatible type.
  Failure: [pigeonhole_sort] is incorrect.
    The following expression:
    
     | pigeonhole_sort 1 [(0, true); (0, false)]
    produces the following result: [[true]] This is invalid. Producing the
    following result is valid: [[true; false]]
